name: streammate-server
description: Backend server for Streammate - a show matching application

scripts.build: echo 'Starting build process...' > build.log && echo 'Current directory:' >> build.log && pwd >> build.log && echo 'Directory contents:' >> build.log && ls -la >> build.log && echo 'Building TypeScript...' >> build.log && tsc --listFiles >> build.log 2>&1 && tsc >> build.log 2>&1 && echo 'Build complete. Contents of dist:' >> build.log && ls -la dist/ >> build.log 2>&1 && cat build.log
scripts.start: echo 'Starting server...' && ls -la dist/ && node dist/index.js
scripts.clean: echo 'Cleaning dist directory...' && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist
